Package com.group13.tmae.controller.athletes

Class AthleteProfileController

java.lang.Object
com.group13.tmae.controller.athletes.AthleteProfileController
@Controller
@RequestMapping("/athlete_profile")
public class AthleteProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller for managing athlete profiles, including viewing, creating, and updating athlete information.

  • Method Details

    • saveAthlete

      @PostMapping("/saveAthlete") public java.lang.String saveAthlete​(@ModelAttribute("athlete") Athlete athlete)
      Processes the form submission for creating or updating an athlete's information.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The athlete object populated with data from the form.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the view to redirect to after processing the form submission.

    • updateAthlete

      @PostMapping("/updateAthlete") public java.lang.String updateAthlete​(@ModelAttribute("athlete") Athlete athlete)
      Processes the form to update an Athlete object based on provided information.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The Athlete object to be updated.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the view to redirect to after processing the form submission.

    • updateAthletePhoto

      @PostMapping("/updatePhoto") public java.lang.String updateAthletePhoto​(@RequestParam("photoFile") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile photoFile, @RequestParam("athleteID") java.lang.Long athleteID, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Handles the submission of a form to update an athlete's profile photo.
      Parameters:
      photoFile - The photo file uploaded by the athlete.
      athleteID - The unique identifier of the athlete whose profile photo is being updated.
      redirectAttributes - The message to be displayed upon redirecting to the desired view.
      Returns:
      A string indicating the view to redirect to after processing the form submission.

    • showAthleteProfile

      @GetMapping("/athlete/{id}") public java.lang.String showAthleteProfile​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles a request to view an athlete's profile.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the athlete to be retrieved.
      model - The model to which the athlete object is to be added.
      Returns:
      The name of the view to be rendered.

    • userProfile

      @GetMapping("/userInfo") public java.lang.String userProfile​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the request to view the profile page of the currently logged-in user. Populates the model with user details and prepares attributes for display on the profile page.
      Parameters:
      model - The Model object that holds attributes to be displayed by the view.
      Returns:
      The name of the user profile view template to render.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/updateUserInfo/{id}") public java.lang.String showUpdateForm​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.support.RedirectAttributes redirectAttributes)
      Displays a form for updating an athlete's personal information. This method ensures that the logged-in user can only update their own information.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the athlete whose information is to be updated.
      model - The model object to which the athlete's current information is added.
      redirectAttributes - Attributes for displaying messages on the redirect page.
      Returns:
      The name of the view for the athlete information update form.
